select gtm.name as gradingName, su.nick_name as userName, a.content as title, gcd.id as contentId, gcd.score from grading g left join sys_user su on su.user_id = g.user_id left join grading_content_rel gcr on g.id = gcr.grading_id left join grading_content gc on gc.id = gcr.content_id left join grading_content_detail gcd on gcd.content_id = gc.id left join grading_template_meta gtm on gtm.id = gc.template_meta_id left join ( select c.row_id, c.content from grading g2 left join grading_content_rel r on g2.id = r.grading_id left join grading_content c on r.content_id = c.id left join grading_template_meta m on m.id = c.template_meta_id where g2.id = #{gradingId} and m.sort = 0 ) a on a.row_id = gc.row_id where g.id = #{gradingId} and gc.system_value = 0
and gcd.grading_user_id = #{userId} order by gtm.sort,gc.row_id asc
